details.reward_rate_estimate_tooltip: Reward rate can't be accurately estimated
details.unstake_before: You already have delegated your balance to a validator. Unstake and try again
details.no_opportunities: No yield opportunities for this token

native_staking.earn_after_warmup_one: You’ll start earning {{count}} day after you supply your assets
native_staking.earn_after_warmup_other: You’ll start earning {{count}} days after you supply your assets
native_staking.earn_rewards_auto: Earned rewards are distributed each {{rewardSchedule}} and accrue to your position automatically
native_staking.earn_rewards_manual: Earned rewards are distributed each {{rewardSchedule}} and need to be claimed manually. Your earnings compound, if you claim and restake quickly
native_staking.unstake_time_immediately: When unstaking, your assets will be available immediately
native_staking.unstake_time_days: When unstaking it takes {{cooldownPeriodDays}} days for your tokens to be available

vault.description: When you deposit {{stakeToken}} you'll receive {{depositToken}}. You can trade this liquid asset at any time
vault.earn_after_warmup_one: You’ll start earning {{count}} day after you supply your assets
vault.earn_after_warmup_other: You’ll start earning {{count}} days after you supply your assets
vault.earn_yield_auto: Earned yield is updated each {{rewardSchedule}} and accrues automatically
vault.earn_yield_manual: Earned yield is updated each {{rewardSchedule}} and needs to be claimed manually
vault.withdrawn_time_immediately: When withdrawing, your assets will be available immediately
vault.withdrawn_time_days: When withdrawing it takes {{cooldownPeriodDays}} days for your assets will be available

lend.description: When you supply {{stakeToken}} you'll receive {{rewardTokens}}. You can borrow against the supplied assets on {{providerName}}
lend.earn_after_warmup_one: You’ll start earning {{count}} day after you supply your assets
lend.earn_after_warmup_other: You’ll start earning {{count}} days after you supply your assets
lend.earn_interest_auto: Earned interest is distributed each {{rewardSchedule}} and accrues automatically
lend.earn_interest_manual: Earned interest is distributed each {{rewardSchedule}} and needs to be claimed manually
lend.withdrawn_time_immediately: Upon withdrawing, your assets will be available immediately
lend.withdrawn_time_days: After withdrawing, your assets will be available in {{cooldownPeriodDays}} days

liquid_stake.description: When you liquid stake {{stakeToken}} you'll receive {{rewardTokens}}. You can trade this liquid asset at any time
liquid_stake.earn_after_warmup_one: You’ll start earning {{count}} day after you stake
liquid_stake.earn_after_warmup_other: You’ll start earning {{count}} days after you stake
liquid_stake.earn_rewards_auto: Earned rewards are distributed each {{rewardSchedule}} and accrue to your position automatically
liquid_stake.earn_rewards_manual: Earned rewards are distributed each {{rewardSchedule}} and need to be claimed manually
liquid_stake.unstake_time_immediately: When unstaking, your assets will be available immediately
liquid_stake.unstake_time_days: When unstaking it takes {{cooldownPeriodDays}} days for your tokens to be available
liquid_stake.unstake_time_days_with_claim_days: When unstaking it takes {{cooldownPeriodDays}} days for your tokens to be available. They need to be claimed within {{claimDays}} days, otherwise they’ll need to be staked again.
liquid_stake.withdrawn_not_available: Withdrawals aren't available at the moment. To exit your position you can sell {{rewardTokens}} any time on DEXs

restake.description: When you deposit {{stakeToken}} you'll receive {{rewardTokens}}. You can trade this liquid asset at any time
restake.earn_after_warmup_one: You’ll start earning {{count}} day after you stake
restake.earn_after_warmup_other: You’ll start earning {{count}} days after you stake
restake.earn_rewards_auto: Earned rewards are distributed each {{rewardSchedule}} and accrue to your position automatically
restake.earn_rewards_manual: Earned rewards are distributed each {{rewardSchedule}} and need to be claimed manually
restake.unstake_time_immediately: When unstaking, your assets will be available immediately
restake.unstake_time_days: When unstaking it takes {{cooldownPeriodDays}} days for your tokens to be available
restake.withdrawn_not_available: Withdrawals aren't available at the moment. To exit your position you can sell {{rewardTokens}} any time on DEXs

details.extra_tezos: You can use or send staked XTZ as normal
details.reward_type_varialbe: {{symbol}} staking rewards rate varies based on the trading and transaction fees the protocol earns which can’t be accurately estimated

review.terms_of_use: By clicking confirm you agree to <underline0>Terms of Use</underline0> and understand the Risk Disclosures
review.deposit_fee_explanation: A flat fee deducted at deposit, reducing the principal.
review.management_fee_explanation: A flat annual fee deducted from vault deposits by minting new shares, diluting participants. Calculated based on time since the last harvest and applied during harvest.
review.performance_fee_explanation: A fee deducted from earnings when a vault harvests a strategy. It’s only applied after surpassing a variable threshold.

steps.title: Follow Steps
steps.sign_transaction_desc: Go back to connected wallet to approve transaction
steps.send_to_finalize_stake: Send transaction to finalize your stake
steps.approve_desc: Approve this transaction in your wallet
steps.approve_error: Something went wrong. Check if wallet is connected

geo_block.title: Geo Block
geo_block.ofac: This feature is not available in {{countryName}}. {{countryName}} is on the Office of Foreign Assets Control (“OFAC”) list of sanctioned countries. You can learn more about OFAC and its sanctions programs here <link0>https://ofac.treasury.gov/sanctions-programs-and-country-information</link0>.
geo_block.ofsi: This feature is not available in {{countryName}}. {{countryName}} is on the U.K.’s Office of Financial Sanctions Implementation (“OFSI”) list of sanctioned countries. You can learn more about OFSI and its sanctions programs here <link0>https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/financial-sanctions-regime-specific-consolidated-lists-and-releases</link0>.
geo_block.pending_litigation: This feature is currently unavailable in {{nameOfRegion}} due to pending litigation on the subject of staking cryptocurrencies
geo_block.crypto_ban: This feature is not available in {{countryName}}. {{countryName}} has implemented firm regulations against the use of cryptocurrencies. Please refer to official {{countryName}} resources to learn more.
geo_block.staking_ban: This feature is not available in {{countryName}}. The Securities and Exchange Commission (“SEC”) of {{countryName}} has restricted digital asset business operators from offering staking services. You can learn more about the SEC regualtions here <link0>https://www.sec.or.th/TH/Pages/News_Detail.aspx?SECID=10018</link0>.
geo_block.ofsi_crypto_ban: This feature is not available in {{countryName}}. {{countryName}} is on the U.K.’s Office of Financial Sanctions Implementation (“OFSI”) list of sanctioned countries. You can learn more about OFSI and its sanctions programs here <link0>https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/financial-sanctions-regime-specific-consolidated-lists-and-releases</link0>. {{countryName}} has further implemented firm regulations against the use of cryptocurrencies.
geo_block.ofac_ofsi: This feature is not available in {{countryName}}. {{countryName}} is on both the Office of Foreign Assets Control (“OFAC”) list of sanctioned countries, as well as the U.K.’s Office of Financial Sanctions Implementation (“OFSI”) list of sanctioned countries. You can learn more about OFAC and its sanctions programs here <link0>https://ofac.treasury.gov/sanctions-programs-and-country-information</link0>, as well as OFSI and its sanctions programs here <link>https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/financial-sanctions-regime-specific-consolidated-lists-and-releases</link>.
geo_block.default: This feature is not available in {{countryName}}.

get_in_touch.title: Need help or have a questions?

what_is_stakekit.title: What is StakeKit?
what_is_stakekit.description: StakeKit is a platform that allows you to easily earn self-custodial yield across all major networks and tokens. From staking and liquid staking, to yield vaults and lending. StakeKit abstracts all complexity so that every yield is accessible in merely 3 clicks. And best of all, it’s fully self-custodial.<br0/><br0/>You can find more information about StakeKit on our <link0>website</link0> or in our <link1>FAQ section.</link1>

under_maintenance.title: Under Maintenance
under_maintenance.description: StakeKit is currently undergoing routine maintenance. Our service is expected to be back up and running in approximately 5-10 minutes.
under_maintenance.description2: We appreciate your patience and encourage you to check back shortly!

positions.title: My Positions
positions.import_validator: Import a validator you have staked with to view your position
positions.search_for_validators: Search for validators by address or name

hasFrozenV1.label: Frozen 1.0
hasFrozenV1.details: {{amount}} TRX are frozen with Legacy Stake 1.0. To migrate to 2.0: Simply unstake {{amount}} TRX in StakeKit and stake again (StakeKit automatically prioritizes unstaking of Stake 1.0 balance)

unstake_sign.title: Verify Ownership
unstake_sign.description: You need to verify ownership of this address to proceed with this action. You will be prompted to sign a message that will be used to verify that you own this address.
